distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for java-1_7_1-ibm fixes the following issues:

IBM Security Update November 2022: (bsc#1205302, bsc#1204703)

- CVE-2022-3676: A security vulnerability was fixed in version 7.1.5.15, adding the reference here.
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In Eclipse Openj9 before version 0.35.0, interface calls can be inlined without a runtime type check. Malicious bytecode could make use of this inlining to access or modify memory via an incompatible type.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
